unnormalised: Obstetrics ani Gynecology (OBGYN) hachem sonvsar sodun kaddop zorurechem dista, khas korun sogllea voizki utranchea vangdda. Dokttr. Meena Sharma sodankal sangtat tech promann, mull thoddi vollokh tumchea bholaikeche vatten cholouche poddtekari kortat. Dekhun, kaim sadharan utram ani poristhithik manddiya.
normalised: Obstetrics ani Gynecology (O-B-G-Y-N) hachea sonvsarantlean cholop chukchukit disonk xakta, khas korun sogllea voizki utranchea sangata. Doctor Meena Sharma sarke hem sodanch sangtat, mull tatvanchi vollokh tumkam tumchea bholaikechea proveasant tabo gheunk saksham korta. Dekhun, kaim sadharan utram ani ghoddnnuko somzavnk sodunk diiat.

unnormalised: Poile prenatal dekhbhal. Hem tuhm garbhest aslelea vellar tumkam mellpi voizki dekhbhallek ullekh korta. Ut'tomponnan, tumchea nimanchea masik dhormik kallak 6-8 satollean bhitor prenatal bhett suru korunk zai. Hea bhettink zait, tumchi OBGYN tumchi ani tumchea bhurgeachi bholaikecher n'zar thevteli, BP (rogtacho dab) zatchea nimnni parokhan karteli ani poshtikhar ani jivan shailiche vixeyant margdarshan deteli.
normalised: Poilem, prenatal dekhbhal. Hacho orth zata tumi garbhavosthent mellovpi bholaike seva. Adarshan, tumchea nimanneache mahavari velar saun sumar so te att satolleank tumi prenatal bhettink survat korunk zai. Hea bhettinkanim, tumcho O-B-G-Y-N tumchi ani tumchea bhurgeachi bholaikecher nazar dovortolo, nemalleo porikxa kortolo zoxe B-P (rogtache chhap) tantunchi tankasni, ani poshann ani jeevon pod'dhotiche vixinim margodorshon ditolo.

unnormalised: Uprant kamgar ani dilivri asa. Kamgaraak 3 stagean vibhagunk zata. Stage 1ant cervical dilation aspaun asa, jem ut'tomponnan vaginal dilivrike 10 cm ponchunk favo. Stage 2 hem khorem burgeachem dilivri, ani Stage 3 hem placentachem dilivri. Dhuk manage korpachi vegveglle rita asa, epidurals samil korun.
normalised: Uprant asa kamgar ani purvon. Kamgarak tin panvddeanim vibhagunk zata. Panvddo ekant girevacchi dilatation cholta, jem adarshan yonidvar purvonak dha centimeter pavo zai. Panvddo don mhollear bhurgeache vastavik purvon, ani Panvddo tin mhollear placenta-che purvon. Dukh nivarpaache vegvegllea pod'dhoti uplabd asa, zantunt epidurals-o aspavta.

unnormalised: Postpartum dekhbhal, vo burgeanchem zolmauprantchi dekhbhal, titich mhotvachi asa. Tumkam dilivri zalelya uprant 6 satollean bhitor ek postpartum check-up asteli. Sadharan chinta mhunje postpartum nirasha, breastfeeding cheo addchnni, ani episiotomies thaun bharaun yevop (zori dilivrint keleo zalear). Ugddas dovrat, tumchem voizki provaidar vo ek support group thaun modot magop mhotvachem asa zori tumhi tras bhogtale zalear.
normalised: Purvon-uparant dekhbhal, vo bhurgeanchea zolmachea uparantli dekhbhal, titlech mhotvachi. Purvon-uparant tumkam sumar so satollea uprant chekup astolo. Sadharan chintamnim purvon-uparant udasi, duddh pilouchi tras, ani episiotomies-antlean bhair sorop (zori purvonnachea vellar kel'lim asli). Ghoddiek tumi tras bhogtat zalear tumchea bholaikechea podadhikari vo adharok pongddacho adhar gheunk chukonaso.

unnormalised: Atam, garbhestponna bhair gynecology bholaikeche vixeyant uloya. Sambhavit problem poilinch vollkhunk sadharan check-up chavi asa. Pap smear, samanyponnan dor 3 vorshan kartat (vo dor 5 vorshan zori HPV testchea vangdda samil kelem zalear), cervical cancerak parok karta. Heo parok 21 vorsanche umrak suru korpacho salvar dila.
normalised: Atam, aami garbhavoste bhair gynecologychea bholaike vixinim ulo maruya. Kaim sambhavit prosnacher zata titlem vegim dhyan divpak nemallim chekup chavi asa. Pap smear, sadharnoponnan dor tin vorsanim kel'lo (vo dor panch vorsanim zori taka H-P-V porikxe sangata melloun kel'lo zalear), gireva cancer-ak tankasta. Heo porikxa sumar ekvis vorsanchea pirayecher suru korpachi sifaros korta.

unnormalised: Sadharan gynecological problemant PCOS (Polycystic Ovary Syndrome), endometriosis, ani fibroids aspaun asa. PCOS tumchea masik dhormachem chakra ani fertilitecher porinnam kartalo. Endometriosisant garbhache tissue garbhache bhair vhaddop asta, tenna pida ani her vichikitsakaronn zata. Fibroids garbhant non-cancerous vhaddopa asa. Heo poristhithi samanyponnan vokhdh vo, kaim poristitint, surgeryn manage karunk zata.
normalised: Sadharan gynecologyache prosnank P-C-O-S (Polycystic Ovary Syndrome), endometriosis, ani fibroids aspavta. P-C-O-S tumchea mahavariche चक्रacher ani fertility-cher probhav korunk xakta. Endometriosis-ant garbhashoyache ut'ti garbhashoyache bhair vadhta, duhk ani her guṇṇikanchem karan zata. Fibroids mhollear garbhashoyant गैर-cancerous vadh. Heo sthitik samani ritin vonxanchi vo, kaim prosnanim, shostrakriyen cholouvpak xakta.

unnormalised: Tumchea gynaecologistak bhett dhil korche khatir bhivnk naka zori tumkam konnem ek sadharan lakshann dislem zalear zoxe sadharan rogot vhanvop, pelvic pida, vo tumchea masik dhormachem chakrant bodlop. Ani, ugddas dovrat ki vaccinations, zoxe HPV vaccine, hem preventative dekhbhalichem ek mhotvachem bhag asa ani samanyponnan 11 ani 12 vorsanche umranchea bhitor 2 doses divpant yeta vo 26 vorsanche umraponchi 3 doses.
normalised: Tumchi gynecology bhair dor ek atakalicho lakxonn tumkam anvbhovta zalear tumchea gynecoligist-ak bhett vegim dovornakodden xirkunk naka zoxe asadharan rogon-galop, pelvic dukhnni, vo tumchea mahavariche चक्रani bodlop. Toxench, yad dovrat kim voixnanchi viksounn, zoxem H-P-V voixin, nirvarak dekhbhallecho ek mhotvacho bhag asa ani tem sadharnoponnan ekadash ani dvadash vorsanchea pirayent vo don vakhreank vo tin vakhreank sumar shod'dexvorsanche piraye meren prashason kela zata.

unnormalised: Nimannem, OBGYN utram ani rit sodun kaddun tumkam tumchea voizki dekhbhalint ek sakriya padkartto korpacho salvar dita. Dokttr. Patil vo konnem voizki professionalak prashn vicharche vellar ani tumchea boreponnak vakalot korche vellar sodankal anond bhogun gheya. Ugddas dovrat, tumchea bholaikeche vixeyant vollokh ek xakti asa.
normalised: Uprant, O-B-G-Y-N utram ani karyo-pod'dhoti somzop tumkam tumchea bholaikent ek sakriya bhag ghevpak favo korta. Doctor Patil vo her kosleai voizki odhikarik proxn vicharunk ani tumchea boremponnachi vakalat korunk tumkam sodanch sovkari anvbhovta. Yad dovrat, tumchea bholaike vixim vollokh khub bori Shakti asa.
